function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High incidence of confirmed cases in Hubei and other provinces","Impact":"Potential for further spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective transmission control measures","Technologies":"Health checkpoints, epidemic models","People":"General population, travelers","Owner":"Health authorities, government"},{"Description":"Initial high case reproduction number (R0) of 3.15","Impact":"Significant potential for rapid spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Scaling up control measures and interventions","Technologies":"Epidemic models, statistical analyses","People":"General population, travelers","Owner":"Health authorities, government"},{"Description":"Effectiveness of control measures on trajectory of the epidemic outside Wuhan city","Impact":"Potential for spread of the epidemic to other regions","Mitigation":"Investigation of control measure effects and implementation of targeted interventions","Technologies":"Epidemic models, statistical analyses","People":"General population, travelers","Owner":"Health authorities, government"}]}
